Projects.name: Route Tracking Mobile App
Projects.p1: Android application that lets users track routes, save them persistently, and rate and share them on social media
Projects.p2: Application uses Google Maps API to track a user’s movement and stores the information in a MySQL database
Projects.p3: Part of three-person team with designing application and implementing CRUD operations on routes

Projects.name: Gamer Lobby
Projects.p1: MEAN stack application that allows users to create players and games in online matching lobby simulation
Projects.p2: Features user authentication, persistent data storage and the ability to add, modify and delete game and player info
Projects.p3: Worked in two-person team, responsible for entire backend, routing, and writing and integrating services with front end

Projects.name: Game Backlog Tracker
Projects.p1: React Native application that allows the user to manage their video game backlog on their mobile devices
Projects.p2: Uses RAWG videogame API to asynchronously let users search for games and add them to a persistently stored list
Projects.p3: Application features multi screen navigation with responsive design depending on user’s device dimensions

Projects.name: Pokémon Randomizer App
Projects.p1: Personal project that allows users to create players, enter a list of Pokémon, and randomize them between players
Projects.p2: Written using React and hosted on Amazon AWS S3 services; uses CSS3 and Bootstrap for responsive page design
Projects.p3: Utilizes React lifecycle methods to manipulate props and stateful values passed through component hierarchies

Projects.name: Webex Quiz and Productivity Bot
Projects.p1: Chat productivity bot for Cisco’s Webex client to assist productivity for students/professors in a learning environment
Projects.p2: Written in Python, lets users create/write quizzes, add resources and assist students within the chat room environment
Projects.p3: led four-person team to 2nd place finish at Cisco Hackathon with creation of idea, design and task organization
